knimeNode.name: WebHDFS Connection (legacy)
knimeNode.shortDescription: Configures the connection information used to connect to a Hadoop Distributed File System (HDFS) via WebHDFS.

fullDescription.intro:
This legacy file handling node has been replaced by the HDFS Connector and will become deprecated in the foreseeable future. For further information about the new file handling framework see the File Handling Guide.
This node configures the connection information that will be used to connect to a remote host.
fullDescription.option: The port where the DFS NameNode Web UI is listen on. The default port on Hadoop 2.x is 50070 and on HDFS 3.0 the default is 9870.

Method of authentication.
User
user name based authentication.
Kerberos
Kerberos ticket based authentication.
Use workflow credentials to determine user.
Name of the user. Optional for Kerberos authentication.
Specify the timeout for the connection in milliseconds here.
Open dialog that test the current connection.

ports.outPort: Port object containing the WebHDFS connection information.
